bill.summary:
Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States:
should condemn every act of violence against Israeli citizens and those who visit Israel in peace and friendship; believes that any chance at lasting peace will only occur through peaceful, bilateral discussions coupled with sound counsel from peaceful allies; supports individuals and organizations working to encourage cooperation between Israelis and Palestinians dedicated to a peaceful resolution of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict; calls on Palestinian Authority President Abbas and the international community to join in condemning the current wave of terrorism in Israel; and reaffirms the strong U.S.-Israel relationship.
